channel.title: Radiance 639
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt][b]Radiance 639[/b][/size][/center] My goal for this server is to make people happy, and build a great community. It is pretty simple, but true. I have ran several severs in a course of four years, and like people to have fun, meet new people, and enjoy the older times of Runescape. [center][b]The Team[/b][/center] [center]Owner: Grant Co Owner: Joe Admin: Insert Name Admin: Lol Mod: None[/center] [center]Todo List:[/center] [center]
- character design needs to be assigned to a npc and work (use the save commands for it after clicking confirm) - iron sword and many weapons need working animations - make wind rush spell work - remove nothing interesting happens when dropping items - npcs need to reset after your done interacting with them(they stand still and follow) - overload needs to change hp display on level button page(prolly just an update player command) - new drops for all npcs (current are way overpowered) - new pricing on all items in shops, and from drops - all eatables need to be coded in - use a blank shop and make 1 at construction area - remove uneeded npcs - fix all npcs drops - change the rewards from the stronghold - change hp on several training zones - snake skin needs to work for ellis - farming, dungeorning, and summoning need to work - finish donater zone - fix error when using iron pickaxes, axes on low level trees or mining
[/center] [center]Media:[/center] [center][spoiler] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/icfzl8fnx/begin.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/ytydydqod/demon.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/5z35ebpzh/dialogue.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/g0cl1dsgd/new_drops.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/6ytga1559/shop_portal.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/shj8ojnm5/starter.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/duia6vozx/starter_items.jpg[/img] [img]http://s4.postimg.org/977mrdc99/yaks.jpg[/img] [/spoiler] [/center] [center]I appreciate you guys for viewing this. I will keep you guys updated with media, and other things throughout the course of development. If you want to be a part or are interested feel free to Skype me at: Radiance317 :)[/center]

item.title: Radiance 639
item.dc:creator: @Dexter2 Dexter™
item.description:
@Dexter2 wrote:

I am an Administrator over at Radiance we have many updates being pushed out daily by our amazing development team the staff acts as a big family we don’t hate on anyone, i suggest you come play the server you won’t regret it one bit, if you need help feel free to message anyone of us who are online and we will reply right back to you as soon as we get it, Come play Radiance a server you won’t regret to play.

Regards, Insert Name

Read full topic

item.title: Radiance 639
item.dc:creator: @InfusedScape InfusedScape
item.description:
@InfusedScape wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Radiance 639[/size][/center]
My goal for this server is to make people happy, and build a great community. It is pretty simple, but true. I have ran several severs in a course of four years, and like people to have fun, meet new people, and enjoy the older times of Runescape.

[center]The Team[/center]
[center]Owner: Grant
Co Owner: Joe
Admin: Insert Name
Admin: Lol
Mod: None[/center]

[center]Todo List:[/center]
[center]

- character design needs to be assigned to a npc and work (use the save commands for it after clicking confirm)
  • iron sword and many weapons need working animations
  • make wind rush spell work
  • remove nothing interesting happens when dropping items
  • npcs need to reset after your done interacting with them(they stand still and follow)
  • overload needs to change hp display on level button page(prolly just an update player command)
  • new drops for all npcs (current are way overpowered)
  • new pricing on all items in shops, and from drops
  • all eatables need to be coded in
  • use a blank shop and make 1 at construction area
  • remove uneeded npcs
  • fix all npcs drops
  • change the rewards from the stronghold
  • change hp on several training zones
  • snake skin needs to work for ellis
  • farming, dungeorning, and summoning need to work
  • finish donater zone
  • fix error when using iron pickaxes, axes on low level trees or mining
[/center]

[center]Media:[/center]
[center][spoiler]








[/spoiler]
[/center]

[center]I appreciate you guys for viewing this. I will keep you guys updated with media, and other things throughout the course of development. If you want to be a part or are interested feel free to Skype me at: Radiance317 :)[/center]
